description: composite purchase order line with dereferenced/expanded orders fields

id.description: UUID identifying this purchase order line

checkin_items.description: if true this will toggle the Check-in workflow for details associated with this PO line

instance_id.description: UUID of the instance record this purchase order line is related to

agreement_id.description: UUID of the agreement this purchase order line is related to

acquisition_method.description: the acquisition method for this purchase order line

adjustment.description: the adjustment record associated with this purchase order line

alerts.description: alerts associated with this purchase order line

cancellation_restriction.description: whether or not there are cancellation restrictions for this purchase order line

cancellation_restriction_note.description: free-form notes related to cancellation restrictions

claims.description: claims associated with this purchase order line

collection.description: whether or not this purchase order line is for a collection

contributors.description: list of contributors to the material

contributor.description: the name of a contributor to the material

cost.description: cost details associated with this purchase order line

details.description: details about this purchase order line

donor.description: the donor contributing to this purchase order line

eresource.description: eresource-related details of this purchase order line

fund_distribution.description: the UUIDs of the fund distribution records for this purchase order line

locations.description: a list of the location records for this purchase order line

owner.description: the owner of this purchase order line

payment_status.description: The purchase order line payment status

physical.description: details of this purchase order line relating to physical materials

po_line_number.description: A human readable number assigned to this PO line

purchase_order_id.description: UUID of this parent purchase order

receipt_date.description: date the purchase order line was received

receipt_status.description: The purchase order line receipt status

reporting_codes.description: a list of reporting codes associated with this purchase order line

requester.description: who requested this purchase order line

rush.description: whether or not this is a rush order

source.description: details related to the source of this purchase order line

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this purchase order line

vendor_detail.description: details related to the vendor of this purchase order line
